summary: A genetically manipulated and very hungry dinosaur escapes from a bioengineering company and reeks havoc on the local desert town. A security guard and a girl environmentalist try to stop both it and the company's doomsday bioweapon.
cast: Diane Ladd|Raphael Sbarge|Jennifer Runyon|Harrison Page|Ned Bellamy|Clint Howard|Frank Novak|Ed Williams|Andrew Magarian|Brent Hinkley|Lisa Moncure|Myron Simon|V.J. Foster|Martha Hackett|Michael Elliott|Michele Harrell|David Sinaiko|Maud Winchester|Norita Golanos|Monte McEvilley|George Perez|Jul Niemier|Dawn McMillan|Pamela March|Scott P. Levy|Paul Di Franco|Rodman Flender|Patricia Harrington|Tony Steinberg|Alan Lasky|Mary Ann Norris|Leonel Claude|Chris Gore
title: Carnosaurios
